## Blog post

You will write a paragraph about your research. You will reference the three scientific articles that you stored in your Bibliography. This task is only about writing the text for your paragraph. You do not yet need to prepare the actual Quarto Document, neither do you have to add in the references as citations. That's what we will practic together next week.

1. Write up a 100 word paragraph about your research using placeholders for citations to the three scientific articles you stored in your Bibliography.
